user_query: I want to chat with an AI chatbot to pass the time. Can you connect me with a chatbot and provide me with a conversation starter? Additionally, fetch the synonyms of the word 'fun' in Portuguese.

TaskList.description: Connect the user with an AI chatbot for conversation.
Generate and provide a conversation starter for the user to use in the chatbot.
Fetch the synonyms of the word 'fun' in Portuguese.
